data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

If you always face forward, you return to the starting point. If you always face right, you take 9 steps right. If you always take 10 steps forward, you take 10 steps forward. If you always take 9 steps right, you take 9 steps right. Thus, the answer is No.
